title: SpeedyPostage
author: SpeedyPostage
content: SpeedyPostage is now accepting Monero and Bitcoin!We have a fully automated, simple form to use for our customers to generate USPS Shipping labelsOur prices are extremely competitive - lower than our BitcoinPostage competitors!All Bitcoin and Monero orders are processed instantly!View our pricing here: https://speedypostage.com/pricingThanks!
